headline: Kroger/Albertsons Ruling Provides Lessons For Merger Remedy Divestitures
summary: On December 10, a federal court in Oregon issued a preliminary injunction against Kroger's proposed $24.6 billion acquisition of Albertsons, which would have been the largest supermarket merger in US...
